CustomField.formula: IF (NOT(ISBLANK( New_Hire_Actual_Start__c )), "New Hire Actual Start", IF (NOT(ISBLANK( Send_Formal_Offer_Date__c )), "Send Formal Offer", IF (NOT(ISBLANK( Initiate_Background_Investigation_Date__c )), "Initiate Background Investigation", IF (NOT(ISBLANK( Tentative_Offer_Accepted__c )),"Tentative Offer Accepted", IF (NOT(ISBLANK( Send_Tentative_Offer_Date__c )), "Send Tentative Offer", IF (NOT(ISBLANK(Certificate_Review_Return_Date__c )), "Certificate Review Returned", IF (NOT(ISBLANK( Certificate_Issue_Date__c )), "Certificate Issue", IF (AND(NOT(ISBLANK(Announcement_Close_Date__c )),Announcement_Close_Date__c < Today()), "Announcement Close", IF (NOT(ISBLANK(Announcement_Open_Date__c )), "Announcement Open", IF (NOT(ISBLANK( Complete_Assessment_Package__c )), "Complete Assessment Package", IF (NOT(ISBLANK( Request_Personnel_Action__c )), "Request Personnel Action", "Hiring Need Validation" )))))))))))
CustomField.label: Current Hiring Stage
